title: How Small Businesses Can Cultivate Loyalty Amid the Great Resignation
sub_head: Being transparent, flexible and generous are three key ingredients to reducing turnover
body:
Candace Nelson, a pastry chef and former investment banker, is co-founder of the cupcake bakery chain Sprinkles. She also is co-founder of CN2 Ventures, which invests in and incubates new business ventures.
American workers are voluntarily leaving their jobs in record numbers this year, a trend often referred to as “The Great Resignation.”
